Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidCellPositionException
    Exception to handle invalid input concerning the matrix indexes
    InvalidDraftPoolPosException
    Exception handling invalid input concerning the dice choice in the draft pool
    InvalidRoundException Deprecated
    (might be useless)
    InvalidValueException
    Exception to handle an invalid dice value
